alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 1:25PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Shelby County through 200 PM CDT... At 124 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Center, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Center, Joaquin, Huxley, Arcadia, James and Jericho. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
